meanings.definition: A person who is excessively concerned with trivial details or rules.
meanings.sent1: My aunt is a fussbudgety when it comes to arranging her bookshelf.
meanings.sent2: The office fussbudgety always reminds us to double-check our paperwork.
meanings.sent3: The fussbudgety librarian insisted on organizing the books by color.
meanings.sent4: His fussbudgety nature made him the perfect candidate for the job of quality control.
meanings.sent5: The fussbudgety teacher noticed the tiniest mistake in the students' essays.

meanings.definition: Behaving in a fussy or overly particular manner.
meanings.sent1: She had a fussbudgety attitude about the way the table was set.
meanings.sent2: The fussbudgety cat refused to eat any food that wasn't served in its favorite bowl.
meanings.sent3: The fussbudgety chef wouldn't start cooking until all the ingredients were perfectly aligned.
meanings.sent4: His fussbudgety behavior extended to color-coding his wardrobe.
meanings.sent5: The fussbudgety artist spent hours adjusting the angle of the painting.
